explanation: [0-0] In the shot, the front of a motorcycle is on the right side of the frame, next to a cake shop with a wooden facade. Two tables and four chairs are placed on the wooden floor at the entrance of the cake shop.

[0-11] A delivery man wearing a dark blue hat and mask rides a motorcycle past the cake shop and exits the frame from the left. Then the shot cuts to a container filled with yellow liquid being poured into another container. On the upper left, flour is poured into a container with yellow liquid. Then, the mixer starts to mix the yellow liquid, the camera zooms in, and you can see the liquid becoming viscous. A container on the left pours eggs into the mixing container. The shot cuts again, and the container on the right pours chunks into the middle container, followed by eggs, then a transparent lid is covered, and the mixing begins. After mixing, the lid is covered with yellow foam. The mixed liquid is poured into a container with a mixer. One hand pours the viscous yellow liquid into an iron basin, followed by orange granules.

[11-21] One hand holds the edge of the basin, and the other hand mixes it with a whisk. The shot cuts to two people mixing the light green liquid in the lower and upper containers respectively. One hand scoops the green liquid from the left container into a bag with a spoon. Then, one hand squeezes the green liquid in the bag into a silver shaping container. Next, the yellow liquid is also squeezed into the silver shaping container, and these containers are placed in a pile of prepared silver containers. Finally, a person puts these containers filled with liquid into the oven, where another tray is baking.
